casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony LAMBERT. No. 87A04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2005. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Frank R. Parrish, District Attorney, for State of NC.

*538The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Appropriate Relief:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2005."
